changeSet.author: jmuzinda
changeSet.comment: Migrate the TransfusionReactionType table from an integer id primary key to a UUID of type BINARY(16).
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE TransfusionReactionType ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE TransfusionReactionType_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE Transfusion_AUD ADD transfusionReactionType_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER transfusionReactionType_id;

ALTER TABLE Transfusion ADD transfusionReactionType_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(transfusionReactionType_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER transfusionReactionType_id;

UPDATE TransfusionReactionType_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN TransfusionReactionType AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;
DELETE TransfusionReactionType_AUD FROM TransfusionReactionType_AUD LEFT JOIN TransfusionReactionType AS joinTable ON (TransfusionReactionType_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null

UPDATE Transfusion AS updateTable LEFT JOIN TransfusionReactionType AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.transfusionReactionType_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.transfusionReactionType_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;

UPDATE Transfusion_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN TransfusionReactionType AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.transfusionReactionType_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.transfusionReactionType_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
